summary: The tale of the extraordinary life and times of Lucky, a horse that was born in captivity but achieves his dream of running free with the help of a stableboy.
cast: Chase Moore|Maria Geelbooi|Arie Verveen|Jan Decleir|Graham Clarke|Patrick Lyster|Morn√© Visser|Dan Robbertse|Nicholas Trueb|Robin Smith|Iluce Kgao|Lukas Haas|Fat Albert|Kateefa
title: Corriendo libre
